name: blaze-longhorns-mcp
description: Texas Longhorns multi-sport MCP for Blaze Sports Intel. Serves baseball → football → basketball → track & field with CDT citations and a no-soccer policy.

requirements: Cloudflare Workers runtime (optional for edge caches)

soccer.message: The Texas Longhorns MCP excludes soccer. Choose baseball, football, basketball, or track & field.

tools.name: get_team_seasons
tools.description: List historical Texas seasons in baseball → football → basketball → track & field order with CDT citations.

sport.description: Optional filter. Defaults to all supported sports.

tools.name: get_season_schedule
tools.description: Return the Longhorns schedule for the given sport/season with CDT citation trail and cache metadata.

sport.description: Sport to fetch. Soccer is rejected.

tools.name: get_game_box_score
tools.description: Return a structured box score or meet result bundle with CDT citations and cache metadata.

gameId.description: Stable identifier for the game or meet.

tools.name: get_player_career
tools.description: Summarize a featured Longhorn's career with CDT citations and cache metadata.

sport.description: Optional sport hint to speed up lookups.

tools.name: get_rankings_context
tools.description: Return rankings context for baseball → football → basketball → track & field, honoring optional filters.

tools.name: search_archive
tools.description: Search the Blaze Sports Intel archive for Longhorns coverage. Soccer queries are rejected.

query.description: Search phrase. Soccer references are rejected.

limit.description: Maximum number of entries to return.
